Models¶

FRI includes models for different problem types. Internally the behavior is encoded in the following classes which should not be used directly. If you want to extend the functionality try to inherit from fri.base_type.ProblemType. or one of these listed. If you want to use FRI for analysis instantiate fri.FRI instead.

class fri.model.Classification(**kwargs)[source]¶
class fri.model.Regression(**kwargs)[source]¶
class fri.model.OrdinalRegression(**kwargs)[source]¶
class fri.model.LUPI_Classification(**kwargs)[source]¶
class fri.model.LUPI_Regression(**kwargs)[source]¶
class fri.model.LUPI_OrdinalRegression(**kwargs)[source]¶
